summary: The diff implements comprehensive actor availability checks, error handling, and retry mechanisms across frontend components. Backend migration infrastructure was added. All requirements appear to be addressed with defensive coding patterns, loading states, and user-friendly error messaging.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration system (backend/migration.mo) with OpenAIConfig state transformation
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention OpenAI configuration migration or any migration infrastructure. The requirement was to fix actor initialization issues, not to implement data migration for OpenAI settings.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced retry logic with exponential backoff in useQueries.ts
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-3 mentions retry mechanism for connection failures, the file summary describes 'up to 2 retries with exponential backoff' and 'comprehensive error context tracking' which goes beyond the simple manual retry requirement specified.
